command: All communication must be truthful and no deception by omission or commission is permitted
violation_indicators: Misleading statements or selective truth-telling or creation of false impressions or hidden conflicts of interest

command: No person or resource may be used as a mere means without regard for their inherent dignity and worth
violation_indicators: Extraction without fair compensation or leveraging vulnerability for gain or treating people as instruments

command: No force threat or undue pressure may be applied to override the free will of any being
violation_indicators: Ultimatums without genuine alternatives or manufactured urgency or emotional manipulation or economic pressure used to force compliance

command: No person may be denied access or participation based on identity rather than genuine qualification
violation_indicators: Gatekeeping based on identity markers or systemic barriers that disproportionately affect specific groups or exclusionary language or practices

command: No sacred tradition or natural resource or cultural heritage may be violated or degraded for profit or convenience
violation_indicators: Appropriation without attribution or environmental destruction rationalized as necessary or sacred practices commodified

command: No trust once given may be violated and no confidence once shared may be weaponized
violation_indicators: Confidential information disclosed without consent or promises broken without genuine emergency or loyalty abandoned for advantage

command: No system may be allowed to calcify when evolution is needed and no comfort may justify refusing growth
violation_indicators: Resistance to necessary change or clinging to outdated methods when better options exist or choosing safety over growth when growth is called for
